original_title: BOC wins Gold at Tags Awards 2023
original_body_lines: The Bank of Ceylon bagged the Gold Award at the recently concluded TAGS Awards 2023 by CA Sri Lanka becoming the winner of the State bank category for its 2022 Annual Report ‘Resilient Resolve Revive’. The event took place at Shangri-La with the participation of Mr.Alejandro Alvarez de la Campa, Country Manager for Sri Lanka and Maldives of the International Finance Corporation and Mr.Andrew Traveller, Acting High Commissioner of New Zealand to Sri Lanka and the Maldives among esteemed guests for the evening. The Bank of Ceylon’s Chief Financial Officer Mr Ruwan Kumara and several officials accepted the award on behalf of the bank.

Commitment to transparency, accountability, governance and sustainability are some essential core-values Bank of Ceylon operates by, and the bank belives it is an honour to be recognized for values it upholds and considers this award very encouraging. Therefore, BOC wishes to extend its gratitude and appreciation to all stakeholders for their efforts ensuring that the Bank’s annual report was of the highest calibre which has enabled the Bank to be recognised.
